umpchange,3,umphome,craws901 umpchange,3,ump1b,barla901 umpchange,3,ump2b,(None) $HP umpire Al Forman struck by a foul ball on the jaw when the ball broke a metal bar on his mask; he suffered a cut requiring four stitches; Shag Crawford moved from 1B to HP and Al Barlick moived from 2B to 1B

ej,maucg101,M,pelec901,Warning to pitcher $Smoky Burgess ducked three pitches; John Buzhardt warned by HP umpire Chris Pelekoudas; Phillies Manager Gene Mauch ejected by Pelekoudas arguing the warning

$Hobie Landrith made a wild throw back to the mound

$Phillies manager Gene Mauch listed three pitchers in his starting lineup because he did not know who the Giants pitcher was going to be; when left-hander Billy O'Dell was listed on the lineup card, Mauch substituted three fielders for his pitchers
